identity.name: NUMBLE
identity.vibe: Retro-Futuristic Arcade, High-Stakes Cyberpunk, Immersive Gaming
identity.core_philosophy: Every interaction must feel like a winning move. Dark immersion with piercing neon feedback.

headings.usage: Main titles, Game Over screens, Level indicators

numbers.usage: The Secret Number, Guesses, Timer, Score

neon_borders.usage: Active inputs, Winning cards, High-priority buttons

grid_background.usage: Body background to give technical depth

lobby.rules: Use 'Tetris' grid mode. Hero section for 'Create Game', smaller blocks for 'Leaderboard' and 'Recent Activity'. Gap-6.

game_arena.rules: Central focus on the input and feedback. Peripheral information (players, history) pushed to edges. Mobile-first: Stack vertically on small screens.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,255,148,0.6)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: border border-secondary text-secondary hover:bg-secondary hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]

cards.default: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-xl overflow-hidden

inputs.game_input: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-primary/50 text-center text-6xl font-mono focus:border-primary focus:outline-none focus:shadow-[0_10px_30px_-10px_rgba(0,255,148,0.3)] placeholder:text-white/10

hero_background.usage: Login screen background, subtle overlay opacity-20

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure neon text on black background meets APCA standards. Use text-shadow for thin fonts.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes (e.g., data-testid='submit-guess-btn').

setup: Install fonts: Orbitron, Outfit, JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts.
Update tailwind.config.js to include new colors and fonts.
Update index.css with the provided HSL variables for the 'dark' theme.
Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the html/body tag by default.
implementation_rules: Use Shadcn components for complex logic (Dialog, Toast, Form) but HEAVILY style them to match the Neon Arcade theme.
Do NOT use default Shadcn cards. Build custom glassmorphic containers.
Use 'sonner' for game notifications (e.g., 'Player X guessed 42!').
Avoid gradients on text unless it's a very large headline.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
